3. How to install¶

3.1. Simple and recommended install procedure¶

  1. This process requires a working Internet connection.
  2. If you’re behind proxy, then do appropriate settings to bypass your proxy server. You will find proxy setting in Settings -> WiFi -> Advance Options and also bypass 127.0.0.1 proxy settings. This is not required for direct Internet connections.
  3. Just go through README.txt for complete installation guide.
